1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.3:
This is a small release mainly to work with newer versions of dynamic trees that removed a method I had unintentionally overridden.

Changes:
• Now works with newer versions of Dynamic Trees.
• Fixed update checker.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.2:
• Fixed server crash involving logging biome names.
• Changed lang files to conform to new DT standards.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1: • Disabling regular Frankincense tree generation now checks that DT world gen is enabled in the config.
